model
Class Position

java.lang.Object
  model.Position

public class Position
extends Object

A class representing a position or position on the Tron board.

Version:
1.2 (17-01-2011)
Author:
Daniel Hessellund Egeberg, Lars Christian Thoudahl, Søren Dahlgaard, Martin Nicklas Jørgensen

Constructor Detail

Position

public Position(int x,
                int y)
Constructor for the Position class.

Parameters:
x - An integer value the will become the positions x-coordinate.
y - An integer value the will become the positions y-coordinate.
Method Detail

getNeighbour

public Position getNeighbour(Direction direction)
Gets the neighboring coordinate in a specific direction.

Parameters:
direction - The direction enum of the direction we want to get the neighbour from.
Returns:
A new position with the correct coordinates for the neightbour. Returns null if an invalid direction is given.

getNeighbours

public Collection<Position> getNeighbours()
A collection of the positions neighbouring this position. Note that only the positions to the west, east, north and south are neighbours. Positions diagonal from this are not.

Returns:
A collection of the neighbouring positions

getX

public int getX()
Returns the x value of the positions coordinate-set.

Returns:
An integer with the x-coordinate.

getY

public int getY()
Returns the y value of the positions coordinate-set.

Returns:
An integer with the y-coordinate.
